quotes.text: I'm only hungry for one thing... Vengeance!
quotes.author: Granny Boar

quotes.text: Before the battle of the fist, comes the battle of the mind.
quotes.author: Master Shifu

quotes.text: I'm not a big fat panda. I'm THE big fat panda.
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: You gotta let go of that stuff from the past because it just doesn't matter. The only thing that matters is what you choose to be now.
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: Now, who wants to do the right thing for the wrong reasons?
quotes.author: Zhen

quotes.text: Who are you? ... I've been asking the same question. Am I the son of a panda? The son of a goose? A student? A teacher? Turns out, I'm all of them.
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: The dead exist in the past, and I must tend to the future.
quotes.author: Lord Shen

quotes.text: Look at this tree, Shifu. I cannot make it blossom when it suits me, nor make it bear fruit before its time.
quotes.author: Master Oogway
